desc: ほのかに緑色に光る美しい鉱石

dictionary.lore: A stone that flickers in a beautiful, faint green color. Though there are many accounts that state it generates from underground caves with high humidity, such as limestone caves, reports of the discovery of this stone only come from Mirvana. Its mysterious light is said to calm the hearts of many, though others enjoy it as a simple decoration itself.

name: 翠晶石

usage.name: 技宝ソルジェネレーター
癒宝ルナジェネレーター
